entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 then becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
